text:
@SecPompeo @WHO Just admit it. #US is incompetent, can't handle the #pandemic. The #coronavirus is bringing you down on your knees. You don't accept responsibility. Blaming others to coverup your incompetence don't save a single American life. Just fix your mess.
Stop making a fool of yourself. https://t.co/VIXgl0gejV
